articles.author: Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 futures are little changed as traders weigh tech giants' earnings: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: "Magnificent Seven" companies Meta Platforms, Microsoft and Tesla posted earnings results after Wednesday's close.
articles.content:
S&P 500 futures slipped Wednesday evening as gold prices climbed. Traders also mulled over the release of earnings reports from major tech firms and the latest Federal Reserve rate decision.
